text: Nocardiopsis salina is a halophilic bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolated from hypersaline soil in the Xinjiang Province in China.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardiopsis salina at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 2004
title: Nocardiopsis salina
